title: Public-Facing Website for taskul.us
description: Build and launch the public website for Taskulus at taskul.us. Gatsby-based static site hosted on AWS Amplify Gen 2, with custom domain and Route 53 DNS. Reference structure: ~/Projects/VideoML/videoml-org
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_close_reason: All child tasks complete; site live at taskul.us.
